(:action clean
    ; Clean an item and update its status
    :parameters (?item - object ?user - person)
    :precondition (and (dirty ?item) (available ?user))
    :effect (and (clean ?item) (not (dirty ?item))

(:action wear
    ; Wear an item if it's clean and update its status
    :parameters (?item - object ?user - person)
    :precondition (and (clean ?item) (not (damaged ?item)) (person ?user))
    :effect (and (wearing ?user ?item) (not (clean ?item))

(:action use ; Use an item for a specific purpose
    :parameters (?npc - person ?item - object ?purpose - purpose)
    :precondition (and (available ?npc) (not (used_for ?item ?purpose)) (suitable_for ?item ?purpose))
    :effect (and (used_for ?item ?purpose) (not (suitable_for ?item ?purpose))

(:action make ; Create or transform an item using a tool
    :parameters (?user - entity ?tool - object ?item - object)
    :precondition (and (available ?user) (usable ?tool) (quality ?item))
    :effect (and (created ?user ?item) (not (quality ?item))

(:action donate ; Donate a resource and update its status
  :parameters (?entity - object)
  :precondition (and (clean ?entity) (not (damaged ?entity)))
  :effect (and (donated ?entity) (not (clean ?entity))
